name: Tacktamania: Honey on the Slaughter
description:
Buddy is back once again in an all-new experience!

Defend  Boundful Benji's Bountyland from an onslaught of Enemies from the Murderous Ozzie gang armed with your trusty revolver and Sheild.

Unlock stupendous power-ups and new weapons to aid you on your journey! 

Can you beat all 50 Waves?
